This directory contains GitHub Actions workflow files.

## ğŸ“ Important

**GitHub Actions ONLY recognizes workflows in `.github/workflows/` directory!**

Workflows in other locations (like `GitHub-Actions/workflows/`) will NOT run automatically.

## ğŸ“‚ Workflow Files

Place your `.yml` or `.yaml` workflow files here.

## ğŸ”„ How It Works

1. Push workflow files to this directory
2. GitHub automatically detects them
3. Workflows appear in the **Actions** tab
4. They run based on their triggers
